title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: The ledge is one of many small, flat areas scattered across the slope of the mountains.  The ominous peaks of the mountain ranges protecting the valley open up towards the southwest.  Beyond the Dead Plateau, the moonlight sparkles weakly on the distant Locksmehr River.

The ledge is one of many small, flat areas scattered across the slope of the mountains.  The ominous peaks of the mountain ranges protecting the valley open up towards the southwest.  Beyond the Dead Plateau, the Locksmehr River is a thin blue line stretching to the horizon towards Wehnimer's Landing.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
